About Us

A person can find meaning in life only through devoting his or her time, wealth, education, and experience to society for its well-being. The visually impaired are one of the most vulnerable groups in our society, so we thought it would be a great idea to make their lives more worthwhile and useful by developing an application so that their free time is used productively. Those people, including small children, read books through the braille method, which is not that much interesting. We, the team Cloud Guage, have decided to create a platform or application software that contains beautiful storybooks for those visually impaired children to listen to beautiful storybooks. Additionally, we are developing this platform as a cloud-based platform. Therefore, we can easily access and also build this software with our team members. Our goal in creating this application was to help blind children, so we plan to add a voice assistant as a new feature. Children can easily use this voice assistant and learn how to adjust to this changing technological world as a result.

Mission

Among the most vulnerable groups in this society are the visually impaired. Our goal is to create a web application for visually impaired people and normal people to listen to live audiobooks. Most visually impaired people have the ability to understand.

Goal

Our goal is to create a web application for visually impaired people and normal people to listen to live audiobooks. Most visually impaired people have the ability to understand.
